com.blogofbug.swing.components.RichComponent

  • Packages that use RichComponent 
    Package Description
    com.blogofbug.swing.components  

    • Uses of RichComponent in com.blogofbug.swing.components

      Classes in com.blogofbug.swing.components that implement RichComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReflectedImageLabel
      A RichComponent which takes the supplied image, adds on 50% to the height of the image and draws a graduated alpha-blended reflection below the top aligned original image.
